org.apache.ignite.ml.composition.boosting.convergence.simple

Class ConvergenceCheckerStub<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.composition.boosting.convergence.ConvergenceChecker<K,V>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.composition.boosting.convergence.simple.ConvergenceCheckerStub<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of a key in upstream data.
    V - Type of a value in upstream data.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ConvergenceCheckerStub<K,V>
extends ConvergenceChecker<K,V>
    This strategy skip estimating error on dataset step. According to this strategy, training will stop after reaching the maximum number of iterations.
    See Also:
